00009 #include "ctimer.h"

00011 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00012 |                    Implementation of the CTimer class                        |
00013 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00014 
00015 // constructor:
00016 CTimer::CTimer():
00017     m_fAspect(0.0),
00018         m_fAspectLast(0.0),
00019         m_fTicksInv(0.0),
00020         m_fFps(0.0f),
00021         m_fDelta(0.0),
00022         m_iTicks(0),
00023         m_iTickStart(0),
00024         m_iPauseTicks(0),
00025         m_bFreeze(false)
00026 {
00027 
00028 }

00032 
00033 }
00034 
00035 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00036 | Function name: CTimer::Init                                                  |
00037 | Description: Initializes the timer,                                          |
00038 |              returns true for succes and false for err                       |
00039 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00040 bool CTimer::Init() {
00041         if (QueryPerformanceFrequency((LARGE_INTEGER *)&m_iTicks) == 0) {
00042                 return false;
00043         }
00044 
00045         m_fTicksInv = 1.0 / (double)(m_iTicks);
00046         QueryPerformanceCounter((LARGE_INTEGER *)&m_iTickStart);
00047         return true;
00048 }
00049 
00050 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00051 | Function name: CTimer::Update                                                |
00052 | Description: Updates tick count... must be called befor drawing of the scene |
00053 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00054 void CTimer::Update() {
00055         //if (m_bFreeze) return;
00056         
00057         m_fAspectLast = m_fAspect;
00058 
00059         QueryPerformanceCounter((LARGE_INTEGER *)&m_iTicks);
00060 
00061         m_iTicks -= m_iTickStart;
00062         m_fAspect = (double)m_iTicks * m_fTicksInv;
00063         m_fDelta = m_fAspect - m_fAspectLast;
00064 
00065         // calculate FPS for each second
00066         if ((unsigned long)m_fAspect > (unsigned long)m_fAspectLast) {
00067                 m_fFps = (float)(1.0/m_fDelta);
00068         }
00069 }
00070 
00071 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00072 | Function name: CTimer::Unfreeze                                              |
00073 | Description: Reduces "time gap" after the window was paused or so...         |
00074 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00075 void CTimer::Unfreeze() {
00076         if (m_bFreeze) {
00077                 Update();
00078                 m_iTickStart += m_iTicks - m_iPauseTicks;
00079                 m_bFreeze = false;
00080         }
00081 }
